item.title: Should junior engineers be worried about AI?
item.description: h2 { margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; } h3 { font-size: 20px; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; } Should junior engineers be worried about AI? ChatGPT is incredible; forget blockchain, forget web3, forget the metaverse. This new form of artificial intelligence is the real deal, and now that the cat is out of the bag, there's no putting it back in. The rise of AI presents opportunities and challenges for junior engineers.
